todoist.name: Todoist MCP Server
todoist.description: Provides tools for interacting with Todoist tasks, projects, and comments. Can create, update, and retrieve task information.

memory.name: Memory MCP Server
memory.description: Offers tools for storing and retrieving information in a persistent memory store. Useful for remembering information across sessions.

slack.name: Slack MCP Server
slack.description: Allows interaction with Slack channels and messages. Can send messages, retrieve channel information, and manage conversations.

brave-search.name: Brave Search MCP Server
brave-search.description: Provides tools for web search using the Brave search engine. Can perform searches and return relevant web results.
